title: Cartman Gets an Anal Probe
synopsis: Cartman tells his friends about the strange nightmare he had the previous night.

title: Weightgain 4000
synopsis: Kathie Lee Gifford comes to South Park to present an award to Cartman, and Mr. Garrison hopes to use the event to assassinate her.

title: Volcano
synopsis: The kids go hunting with the rather trigger happy Jimbo and Ned. Little do they know that a volcano is on the verge of erupting.

title: Chickenlover
synopsis: Officer Barbrady resigns when chickens are mysteriously molested all over South Park.
